law.catch_line: SCHEDULE OF TRAFFIC AND PARKING REGULATIONS; INCORPORATION BY REFERENCE.

section.text: Whenever the provisions of this chapter establish specific traffic and parking regulations and restrictions which are effective only upon certain streets, parts of streets or street areas which are not generally identifiable, or at certain times or for periods of time which are not generally applicable, such traffic and parking regulations, and the locations and/or times where and when the same are effective shall be set out upon official traffic schedules, as amended from time to time by the City Council, and retained permanently in the office of the City Clerk.
